dc:title: On Pilgrimage - April 1964
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Chronicles trips to Chicago, Montreal, and Vermont where she visited friends and family, and attended meetings where she often spoke.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 814 1964-04-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
